info.name: EASB - ASB Komponen Bangunan Pros Std Module API
info.description: API collection for ASB Komponen Bangunan Pros Std Module - managing ASB Komponen Bangunan Pros Standard data.

item.name: ASB Komponen Bangunan Pros Std Management (SUPERADMIN Only)
Create ASB Komponen Bangunan Pros Std

request.description:
Create a new ASB Komponen Bangunan Pros Std entry. Requires SUPERADMIN role.

**Fields:**
- `idAsbKomponenBangunanStd` (number, required): ID of the related ASB Komponen Bangunan Std
- `min` (number, optional): Minimum value
- `avgMin` (number, optional): Average minimum value
- `avg` (number, optional): Average value
- `avgMax` (number, optional): Average maximum value
- `max` (number, optional): Maximum value

item.name: Update ASB Komponen Bangunan Pros Std

request.description:
Update an existing ASB Komponen Bangunan Pros Std. Requires SUPERADMIN role.

**Fields:**
- `id` (number, required): ID of the ASB Komponen Bangunan Pros Std to update
- `idAsbKomponenBangunanStd` (number, optional): ID of the related ASB Komponen Bangunan Std
- `min` (number, optional): Minimum value
- `avgMin` (number, optional): Average minimum value
- `avg` (number, optional): Average value
- `avgMax` (number, optional): Average maximum value
- `max` (number, optional): Maximum value

item.name: Delete ASB Komponen Bangunan Pros Std

request.description:
Delete an ASB Komponen Bangunan Pros Std entry. Requires SUPERADMIN role.

**Fields:**
- `id` (number, required): ID of the ASB Komponen Bangunan Pros Std to delete

item.description: Management operations for ASB Komponen Bangunan Pros Std

item.name: ASB Komponen Bangunan Pros Std Queries
Get ASB Komponen Bangunan Pros Stds (Paginated)

request.description:
Get paginated list of ASB Komponen Bangunan Pros Std entries.

**Request Body:**
- `page` (number, required): Page number (minimum 1)
- `amount` (number, required): Items per page (minimum 1)

item.name: Get ASB Komponen Bangunan Pros Std Detail

request.description:
Get detailed information for a specific ASB Komponen Bangunan Pros Std entry.

**Request Body:**
- `id` (number, required): ID of the ASB Komponen Bangunan Pros Std (minimum 1)
